works.title: Analytics Dashboard
works.longDescription: A comprehensive analytics dashboard that provides real-time insights into business metrics. Features interactive charts, customizable widgets, and advanced filtering capabilities. Built with performance in mind to handle large datasets efficiently.

works.title: E-Commerce Platform
works.longDescription: A full-featured e-commerce platform with seamless shopping cart, secure checkout, and inventory management. Includes admin panel for product management, order tracking, and customer analytics.

works.title: Mobile Fitness App
works.longDescription: A mobile-first fitness tracking application that helps users monitor their workouts, nutrition, and progress. Features include custom workout plans, meal logging, and progress visualization with charts and graphs.

projects.title: Creative Portfolio
projects.longDescription: A sleek and minimalist portfolio website designed for creative professionals. Features smooth page transitions, an image gallery with lightbox functionality, and a blog section for sharing insights and updates.

projects.title: Social Hub
projects.longDescription: A social media platform that enables users to connect, share content, and engage with their community. Includes features like real-time messaging, post reactions, and user profiles with customizable themes.

projects.title: Landing Page Studio
projects.longDescription: A collection of modern, high-converting landing page templates designed for startups and businesses. Each template is fully responsive, optimized for performance, and includes sections for hero, features, testimonials, and CTAs.
